if(QT_VERSION_MAJOR EQUAL 6)
    set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/qt6/include")
    set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/qt6/lib/${ANDROID_ABI}/libquazip1-qt6.so")
else()
    set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/qt5/include")
    set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/qt5/lib/libQt5Quazip_${ANDROID_ABI}.so")
endif()
